weakness.name: Undetected changes in security groups
weakness.desc: The changes in security groups must be traced and monitored and the correspondent personnel must approve these changes. If the situation is not the correct, attackers can access to security systems.

test.steps:
1. Go to "Monitor" and then to "Alerts".
  2. Check that there is any rule to notify when the security groups or security group configurations change.
  3. Check if these rules are enabled.
